column4: hello, i'm trying to recover a WEP password, does someone have a good recent tutorial about that?
the aircrack-ng package seems outdated according to apt-get
thats not really supriseing. there may be newer PPA's for it.
can't find a ppa for it
i don't get it, according to https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/aircrack-ng, it should be supported
